content:
The earth needs love
想画这张图的当天抽到这张卡
I have picked this card when I wanted to draw this picture

地球（这个星球）需要人类的爱滋养
The earth(planet） needs love to nuture

用阿乙莎的话说，地球承载了人类太多负面的能量，需要一个清理的过程
As Aheetha says, the earth have suffered from too much negative energy from human for a long time, it takes time to clean

左边是西方的拉斐尔天使，代表疗愈和健康
On the left hand is archangel Raphael from west, he presents cure and health

右边是东方的绿度母，救人脱离灾难
On the right hand is Green Tara from east, she helps people from disasters

但众生皆是一，无论你来自哪个地区，我们都是人类这个家庭
But all is one, there is no different about who comes from which country, for we're a member of the family "human"

人类与人类，人类和自然，动植物应该和谐相处
People should be in harmony with each other, including nature, plants and animals
